# Anime Info CLI

A simple CLI application to fetch information such as title, genre, or ranking for any anime.

## Features
✅ Anime Title
✅ Broadcast
✅ Episodes
✅ Anime status
✅ Anime genre
✅ Popularity
✅ Anime rank
✅ Anime Characters
